record.message:
APPLYING OUT-OF-BOX UPGRADE IS COMPLETE. You will be automatically logged out after clicking the Finish button.
Next steps: 1. Fix all of errors in except.log, and verify your fixes. 2. Resolve all of conflicts in upgraderesults table, and verify your resolution. 3. Create custom upgrade package. 4. Apply custom upgrade package to another copy of production system to verify it. 5. Apply custom upgrade package to your production system.
